Among others: address table by their unquoted name

cdm_with.Rd

FIXME: missing description

cdm_with(dm, code)

Arguments

dm

A dm object.
code

An expression to evaluate in the context of the dm object.

Examples

cdm_with(cdm_nycflights13(), airports)
